title: Flex rank I didnt ban champion, just kick me out?
body: I was play a flex rank, and i didnt ban any champion, and then just kick me out for what？ｉ　ｓａｗ　ａ　ｌｏｔ　ｏｆ　ｖｉｄｅｏ，　ｔｈｅｙ　ｄｉｄｎｔ　ｂａｎ　ｃｈａｍｐｔｉｏｎ　ｔｏｏ，　ｗｈｙ　ｗｈｅｎ　ｔｈｉｓ　ｈａｐｐｅｎ　ｔｏ　ｍｅ，　ｉｓ　ｋｉｃｋ＞？

replies.body: If you don't ban any champions the client will think that you're afk and kick you out. Make sure you ban someone before the timer runs out!
